item.title: ModSecurity
item.description: so hello.. how are you doing..? how is life? im good, thank you!. ***Status Update: I’ve seen better days tbh, i’ve faced a lot of challenges this month, im having burnout? wtf! what is that? you ask’? just google it.. In the entirety of my life, i never hated computers and programming/ developing in general, but recently i grown a haterd to computers and coding disgusts me.. like WTH?
